name: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Linux Systems Administration

Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Li: Certificate of Undergraduate Study in Linux Systems Administration The Certificate of Undergraduate Study (CUGS) in Linux Systems Administration is designed to offer students the opportunity of a specialized study to provide students with experience in key courses of this discipline at the undergraduate level. This CUGS prepares students to sit for the following certification exams: CompTIA Linux+

courses.subject: CST
courses.title: Introduction to Computer Networks and Data Communications

notes: Required Courses: 12 s.h. Students seeking this CUGS are required to successfully complete (grade of D- or better) the four courses in the order listed below:
